abstract: Michael S. Sherwood, a banker and vice chairman based in London, will succeed Gary D. Cohn as chairman of the bank’s partnership committee.
snippet: Michael S. Sherwood, a banker and vice chairman based in London, will succeed Gary D. Cohn as chairman of the bank’s partnership committee.
lead_paragraph: There is nothing like a change in the leadership of Goldman Sachs‘s influential partnership committee to fan rumors of succession at the influential Wall Street bank.

headline.main: Goldman Partnership Memo Stirs Succession Talk
